thread.title: Arlluk Technology Solutions, LLC appoints Oleg Volkov Vice President of Software Development

author: cnbc.com
title: Arlluk Technology Solutions, LLC appoints Oleg Volkov Vice President of Software Development
text:
CHANTILLY, Va., Feb. 26, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Oleg Volkov has joined Arlluk Technology Solutions as Vice President of Software Development. Dr. Volkov brings over 20 years of IT experience leading large and complex IT programs and technical solutions delivery. He will oversee software development capability building and delivery activities for Arlluk and other Koniag Government Services companies. Prior to joining Arlluk, Volkov served as Deputy CTO and Vice President of Dovel Technologies and held multiple leadership positions with Booz Allen, Lockheed Martin, Salient Federal. "Oleg brings a wealth of knowledge and experience in software development and delivery. His addition to the Arlluk and Koniag Executive Team will help the company build new capabilities and create cutting-edge solutions for our customers," noted Gene Zapfel, President of Arlluk.
About Arlluk Technology Solutions, LLC
Arlluk is a SBA certified 8(a) small business and a wholly owned subsidiary of Koniag, Inc. an Alaskan Native Corporation. Arlluk provides Software Development, Cloud Solutions, Digital Design, and other IT Services to Federal, State and Local Governments.
